title: Arlan Hamilton
description:
In this episode Ellen sits down with author, investor, and founder and managing partner of Backstage Capital, Arlan Hamilton. They discuss women in finance, the benefits of losing, and how to turn disadvantages into opportunities.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
